title: 73 Hidden Connections Between GODZILLA VS KONG and the MONSTERVERSE | Easter Eggs

description:
In this video we take a look at some of the the hidden similarities, connections, differences and Easter Eggs in HBO Max's Godzvilla Vs. Kong, King of the Monsters, Kong: Skull Island, and Godzilla (2014). Monsterverse!
